item.title: Mahatma Jyotirao Phule Dedicated His Life to Social Equality, Education, and Women's Empowerment: Gadwal District Collector
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: Mahatma Jyotirao Phule was a great visionary who dedicated his entire life to the cause of social equality, the right to education, and women's empowerment, stated Gadwal District Collector B.M. Santosh. On Friday, as part of the 198th birth anniversary celebrations of Mahatma Phule, the Collector, along with Gadwal MLA Bandla Krishna Mohan Reddy, paid floral tributes to Phuleâ€™s statue at Krishna Veni Junction in the heart of Gadwal town.
Speaking on the occasion, the District Collector...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
